# Intro
Obter o layout da rede no RedeR
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(igraph)
library(magrittr)
```

# Dados
```{r rows.print=5}
data(
  gene_ids,
  gene_pathways,
  string_edgelist,
  package = "neurotransmission"
)
```

# RedeR
```{r}
vertices <- gene_ids %>% na.omit %>% inner_join(gene_pathways)

g <- graph_from_data_frame(string_edgelist, directed = F, vertices = vertices)

V(g)$size <- V(g)$system_count
```

## Relaxamento
```{r echo=T, eval=T, include=FALSE}
rdp <- RedPort()
calld(rdp)
addGraph(rdp, network, gcoord=c(40,40), gscale=15, isNest=F, theme='tm1', zoom=25)
#first
relax(rdp,
      p1=75,
      p2=100,
      p3=1000,
      p4=300,
      p5=500,
      p6=100,
      p7=10,
      p8=10,
      ps=TRUE
)
```
